Dumbbell Yoga: A workout program that incorporates dumbbells into yoga poses to increase resistance and challenge the body.
Dumbbell Bootcamp: A high-intensity workout program that uses dumbbells for strength and cardio exercises.
Dumbbell Circuit Training: A workout program that involves through a series of exercises using dumbbells, with minimal rest in between.
Dumbbell CrossFit: A workout program that combines elements of CrossFit with dumbbell exercises to create a full-body workout.
Dumbbell HIIT: A workout program that uses dumbbells for high-intensity interval training, alternating between strength and cardio exercises.
